name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"7c78191f-67b8-4ab1-be35-e715873c84b4","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Method Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c2dda77e-efe8-449d-a9d1-43cd13047301","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the top-level orchestrator of the Jarvis CLI. It handles the transition from a user's terminal command to a structured analysis session. Its responsibilities include initializing the analysis environment, executing the core engine, and managing the serialization of results.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5e83718d-6891-4e7a-9c2c-41dda2175ca7","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"bdfff9b7-7138-468a-bea6-93dccc9880f4","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic Flow","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"39c3abd8-038b-4f8a-8faf-6d866fc3a08e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Argument Parsing","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It defines and processes a variety of command-line arguments using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"argparse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". These flags control the depth (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"--decy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), precision (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"--precision","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), and scope (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"--package","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"--entry_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") of the analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5d5bf67f-175e-47bb-8d8a-ca4ac1c8dc71","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Generator Initialization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It instantiates the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". At this stage, the configuration options (like flow-sensitivity) are passed down to the core engine.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"265869c1-1e83-4c10-8b93-4b0225473a64","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Execution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The function triggers ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cg.analyze()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which initiates the heavy lifting: AST traversal, scope resolution, and points-to analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e5bf1f71-e7fd-4f2c-9b4b-dc90a59975da","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Formatting","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Once analysis is complete, it hands the raw ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"formats.Simple","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" formatter. This converts the internal graph and metadata into a structured dictionary format.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b3f9cb03-4ac9-4a85-b763-55a303f0adcc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Output Management","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"a630665f-eada-4570-a89d-88da3637d2be","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"-o","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"--output","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" flag is provided, the function writes the resulting JSON to the specified file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fdb00628-acdc-41fa-a994-a72fae59e0b1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Otherwise, it prints the JSON output directly to the standard output (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"stdout","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), allowing for piping to other tools.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"55a8061d-cbb5-468d-9659-8adf16cec33f","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"d7ad4134-df78-42d1-a2ba-e26f57774876","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"CLI Interaction Insight","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0428ce5f-6069-4a02-a7e2-f72a1d3731c7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function exposes several critical tuning parameters for the analysis:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"84fe4a25-0a6b-47aa-8739-9497c66000d6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Precision Toggle","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Setting ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"--precision","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" changes how variables are modeled in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"machinery","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" layer. If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the system performs line-by-line value tracking; if ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"False","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it uses an aggregated "bias" approach for faster performance.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"93446add-08dd-4ae4-ac3e-27e79b55053a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dependency Iteration","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"--decy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" flag determines whether Jarvis should follow ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"import","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statements into third-party or sibling modules to build a deeper call graph.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"49a29de5-8ceb-4246-aed6-7059930cb08e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"fd47b61b-f688-4b39-ab90-f9e32bfa5daa","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"679d1ffe-6adb-45c1-81f8-085229a7b4d3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Running the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function through the command line:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e1be7101-665b-481d-a909-89978ed2f6ba","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"bash"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# Basic run printing to console
python jarvis_cli.py main_script.py

# Advanced run with precision enabled and output to a file
python jarvis_cli.py service.py --package ./my_project --precision --output graph.json","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd1db57f-a14e-4d53-97bd-4eb0a7318a4a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab7919d2-da5a-486c-8aa7-47c6ae3e4aea","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Performance Monitoring","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The function records the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"start_time","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", allowing for performance auditing and benchmarking of analysis runs over large codebases.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a1977bb9-0943-4989-9903-3373fe250978","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Data Integrity","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By raising an exception if no modules are provided, it ensures that the analysis engine is never run in an unconfigured state.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"24c04eb2-9db5-4f91-b45e-e64a34caa431","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Flexibility","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The output is serialized using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"json.dumps","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", making it compatible with a wide variety of downstream data processing and visualization tools.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d539f435-7ce9-43c6-823b-809bccc1f7c8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
